description.value:
Ammunition round

Activate 1 Interact

This bullet is fashioned from a rubbery substance and stamped with the image of a diminutive ant twitching in surprise. The bullet deals no damage on a successful hit. Instead, the target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19] save.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target shrinks to Tiny size for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]] rounds. Its reach becomes 0 feet, and it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} for this duration.

Critical Failure The target shrinks to Tiny size for 1 minute. Its reach becomes 0 feet, and it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} for this duration
